nodes.title: CBDIBD e-commerce
nodes.excerpt:
E-commerce website development for CBDIBD project. Performed integrations with:

Mailchimp

nodes.title: ALG – website development
nodes.excerpt: algbet.lv website development based on designer-provided mockup screens. Solution implementation is based on WordPress where content es editable for the website admin.

nodes.title: TrustAD – website development
nodes.excerpt: TrustAD website development based on client-provided design screens. WordPress theme has been created to bring admins the option to edit any content block, spacings between sections, or change pictures.

nodes.title: Restauratori – educational hidden object game
nodes.excerpt: Restauratori is educational hidden object game where players need to seek objects that doesn’t actually exist in artist artwork.

nodes.title: Sneakypeer – Full cycle SaaS development
nodes.excerpt: Sneakypeer is P2P data analytics platform which was developed and supported by /KALMARS/

nodes.title: TV24 – Website redesign and more feature implementation
nodes.excerpt: TV24 website design development and implementation by creating a WordPress theme that is configurable and editable for site admin

nodes.title: SpeletGaming – Website development
nodes.excerpt: spēlēt.lv organizes a unique CS:GO tournament, which goal is to develop professional e-sport culture in Latvija !
